resources.string: "This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone."
"This app won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet."
"This app won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"This app won't run unless you update Google Play services."
To use Google+ you need a Google Account.
Select the account that you want to use to sign in to Google+.
"Couldn't sign in, possibly because there's a problem with Google+ account permissions."
"Couldn't sign in because there's a problem with your Google+ profile. Go to http://plus.google.com/ on your computer to learn more."
An important new version of Google+ is available. You need to upgrade before you can continue using Google+.
Your administrator has disabled mobile access for your account.
"You've turned off sync in the Android \"Accounts & sync\" settings. Instant Upload will not work until you turn sync back on."
In order to turn on Instant Upload, Sync %s must be enabled for this account. Would you like to enable it now?
Save your mobile photos in a private Google+ album
Instant Upload stores your photos and videos in a private album on Google+. You decide whether to share them later.
Uploading over a mobile network will use your data connection and may cost you money. Turn this off at any time in Settings.
Google+ is more fun when you add lots of people and pages
Keep your contacts up to date
You are not signed into Google+.
Do you want to delete this tag?
Do you want to report this photo?
Video not available at this time. Please refresh.
Item not available at this time. Please refresh.
This image is too large to download, would you like to retry at smaller resolution?
"The photo couldn't be saved to the device."
You can only select images that are at least 470 pixels wide.
Set a ringtone for new notifications
You must have a data connection to see some Google+ settings. Please check your connection or try again later.
Your request to join was approved
Automatically upload new photos and videos to a private album on Google+
To turn on Instant Upload you need to enable %s in the Android \"Accounts & sync\" settings
To turn on Instant Upload you need to enable sync in the Android \"Accounts & sync\" settings
Upload photos & videos when roaming on a data network
Upload photos & videos only when charger connected
Only when there is a WiFi connection available
When there is a WiFi or mobile data connection available
Only when there is a WiFi connection available
When there is a WiFi or mobile data connection available
Full size (Could not determine available storage space)
Standard size (Insufficient storage space for full-size upload)
Standard size (Unlimited free storage at 2048 px)

Upload all photos & videos now (if connection settings allow)
Uploading all photos & videos may take some time. Do you want to continue?

Join the hangout when the event starts
"Have dinner with friends, plan a party and view everyone's photos."

Do you want to delete this comment?

Do you want to unmute this post?

"Can't retrieve post audience. Try again later."

You cannot share this item right now because you are signed in with a different account. Please switch accounts in Google+ and try sharing again.
No preview available, but you can share a comment instead.
Sorry, there was a problem with sharing your item.
"Couldn't share post. Check your network settings or try again later."
There was a temporary problem adding your +1.
"Can't create the post. Try again later."
Do you want to discard this draft?
Your location is attached to this post. Touch the location icon to remove it.
Your location is attached to this post. Touch the location name to edit or remove it.
This post was originally shared with a limited audience. Remember to think about who you share it with.
"Couldn't retrieve people who have added you on Google+."
"You aren't connected to anyone. Try adding some people to your circles."
You have no circles. Try creating one.
"Can't create an event at this time."
Are you sure that you want to discard your changes to this post?
Are you sure that you want to discard your changes to this comment?
Please complete all ratings to publish your review
Posting publicly on the web as %s.
Enter a name, email or circle
"Couldn't create the conversation because of an error."
"Couldn't create the conversation because it's too large."
"Can't create the conversation because not all participants are valid."
"Couldn't add %s because their email address couldn't be processed."
"Couldn't add %s because their phone number couldn't be processed."
"Couldn't add %s to the conversation because they have a phone number in a country that is not supported."
"%s couldn't be added. The number of invited SMS participants has been exceeded for this conversation."
"Circles that you're \"just following\" are excluded when you share with \"Your circles\"."
Do you want to discard these changes?
Do you want to block this person?
Do you want to block this user?
Do you want to unblock this person?
Do you want to unblock this page?
Click OK to stop getting notifications from him. You can still see what he posts in your stream or on his profile.
Click OK to stop getting notifications from her. You can still see what she posts in your stream or on her profile.
Click OK to stop getting notifications from them. You can still see what they post in your stream or on their profile.
Click OK to receive notifications when he shares with you.
Click OK to receive notifications when she shares with you.
Click OK to receive notifications when they share with you.
Please report this on the desktop interface. You will need to provide identifying information to corroborate this claim.
Some photos could not be shared with this event.
Click OK to receive notifications for all new posts in %s.
Notifications are enabled for posts in %s.
Click OK to no longer receive notifications for posts in %s.
Notifications are disabled for posts in %s.
Receive notifications for all new posts in these circles:
Use Settings" to set who can send you messages. If you don't want to hear from this person again, "block ^1.
^1 has started a conversation with you for the first time.
Who can add you to conversations
Your extended circles can add you
Setting who can add you to a conversation…
"Couldn't set who can send you messages."
Open a web page where you can delete your Google+ profile and content

"When you click OK a web page opens. * Ensure that you're signed in with the account whose Google+ profile you want to disable. If not, sign out and sign in with that one. * You remove the Google+ app with the Apps settings."
You already have a circle with this name.
%s has been added to your circles.
Keep your contacts up to date
Add your Google+ connections to Android contacts
Let Google make suggestions based on who you communicate with most often on this phone.
Let Google make suggestions based on who you communicate with most often on this tablet.
A fast way to group message with your circles. Learn more.
"Upgrading your profile to a cover-photo layout can't be undone."
"Google+ app can't handle this link. Sending it to the Browser."
You need to configure a Google+ account before joining hangout.
You need to be 18 years or older to join a hangout from a mobile device.
"This type of hangout isn't supported on this device right now."
Check your hair. Then touch \"Hang out\".
There was an error. Re-type this hangout.
Hangout was disconnected from the server. Check your network connectivity then try again.
"Couldn't authenticate. Re-type your password then try again."
Timed out while connecting. Check your network connectivity then try again.
Timed out while entering hangout. Check your network connectivity then try again.
"You can't join this hangout because one of the participants has blocked you."
"You can't join this hangout because you've blocked one of the participants."
The hangout seems to be jam-packed already. There is no more room.
"Couldn't enter hangout because of a server error. Try again."
There was an error getting information about the hangout. Try again.
Please install the latest version of Google+ to use hangouts.

"The Hangout component is missing or misconfigured. Try the following remedies in sequence:
1. Restart the application. 2. Force-kill the application (from system settings) and then restart it. 3. Reboot and then restart the application. 4. Remove, re-install, then restart the application."

"It's easy to block someone by tapping their image or video and then selecting , or tap to leave the hangout immediately.

Anyone in the hangout can invite others to join, including people who are not in your circles."

"We are introducing a feature that improves our ability to keep our users safe in Hangouts. Now, when a user reports abuse, we'll record a short snippet of the hangout. The recording is only used to evaluate the report and is discarded shortly thereafter."
Important: In this hangout, you must not include any copyrighted material that you do not own or for which you do not have the appropriate rights.
I agree to allow my participation in this hangout to be recorded and publicly streamed on Google+ and YouTube.
There was an error while in hangout. Try again.
There was a problem with your audio or video. Exit and re-enter the hangout.
Touch to return to the hangout.
"There's no one else in this hangout at the moment."
A portion of this hangout is being recorded because abuse has been reported.
Waiting for %1$s and 1 other to join…
Waiting for %1$s and %2$s others to join…
It looks like no one could make it…
Hangout audio will be muted while other apps are playing audio.
Crash report sent. Thank you and sorry for the inconvenience.
"When you share publicly, people who you haven't added to your circles will be able to view your post and may be able to comment."
"Can't load event description. Check your connection."
All new photos and videos in your camera roll will be shared live with event guests. Party Mode automatically turns off when the event ends.
All new photos and videos in your camera roll will be shared live with event guests and anyone viewing this event on air. Party Mode automatically turns off when the event ends.
All new photos and videos in your camera roll will be shared live with event guests and anyone viewing this event publicly. Party Mode automatically turns off when the event ends.
"You've turned off sync in the Android \"Accounts & sync\" settings. Party Mode will not work until you turn sync back on."
Party Mode will not work until you enable Sync %s for this account. Would you like to enable it now?

This post is not visible to the community because it may violate our policies. You can restore or remove it via desktop.

Do you want to undo flagging this comment as inappropriate?
Touch to plus one this post.
Touch to remove your plus one from this post.
You have added your plus one to this post.
You have removed your plus one from this post.
Visible to anyone (public on the web).
Visible to everyone in your circles, plus all the people in their circles.
Sorry, Google Play is required to complete this action.
Circles let you control how you connect with people. Tap to change.

%1$s and others are now on Google+

You need to join the community to see posts.

"Can't update notification settings. Try again later."
You have been invited to a community
Search above or browse our suggested communities.
You have blocked one or more moderators of this community. Moderators can see all posts shared with this community even if you block them.
Are you sure that you want to decline this invitation?
Your content remains visible in a private community after you leave, unless you delete it first.
Your content remains visible in a public community (and on your profile) after you leave, unless you delete it.
Blocking is different in communities. Learn more
